channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple 24-inch iMac (2024): Specs, Release Date, Price, Features
item.description: The desktop computer has been upgraded with the latest M4 chip and USB-C accessories.

item.title: Google-backed Open Cloud Coalition launches to lobby European lawmakers

item.title: AI Slop Is Flooding Medium
item.description: The blogging platform Medium is facing an influx of AI-generated content. CEO Tony Stubblebine says it “doesn’t matter” as long as nobody reads it.
